info.name: deviantN0NNAKED-THREADING v7 (rotane)
info.description:
Visually glues N0NNAKED comments together. ATTENTION: Requires this style to work: style 25743 !!!

Go to the style's page on deviantART: http://fav.me/d3r9x2i
info.additionalInfo:
works on deviantART.com

update v0.2: removed -moz- prefix for Firefox 13 compatibility.
update v0.3: cosmetic fixes.
update v0.4: quick fox for when a nested comments is the first on a page.
